title: ISic000098. Honours for an unknown member of the equestrian order
body:
Facsimile Images

1[---]IOSEX[------]
2[..........]OPRAEFFAB.[...........]
3[..]GXII.[..]MINáTAEPRO[......]
4CAESAR.[.]CYPRIPRAEFCH[...---]
5EQUITáTAE      ET    IULIA[.---]
6MLIVIUSMACEDONIC[..---]
7L      [......]

4: orig.

Apparatus criticus

Text based on autopsy

translation

commentary

The restored text is based upon that proposed by H.G. Pflaum, in Les carrières procuratoriennes équestres sous le Haut-Empire romain (1960-61), vol. 1, p. 7, A(8).
